invalid_id: Invalid Player ID `%s`. Please check again.
get_captcha_fail: Failed getting captcha. Try again later.
cant_claim_until: You can't claim the gift again until %s
no_more_gifts: Sorry there are no more gifts available! (Please contact admin)
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong... Did you already received a gift this month?
a_problem_occured: A problem occured when trying to redeem your gift. Please try again later.
congratulations: Congratulations! Your gift has been sent to your in-game mailbox. Go and check it out!
